description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'MenuItemCard' that displays information about a menu item, including an image, name, description, price, and an 'Add' button. It is used within a food ordering app UI.

classes.name: MenuItemCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays details of a MenuItemModel, including image, name, description, price, and an add button.

methods.name: MenuItemCard
methods.description: Constructor for the MenuItemCard widget, requiring a MenuItemModel item and a VoidCallback onAdd.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method that constructs the widget tree for displaying a menu item card.
